full_summary:
### **EF245-231419-3: RFP for Office Furniture Acquisition**

**Solicitation Details:**

* Solicitation Number: WS3764341560
* Reference Number: WS3764341560-Doc3843582961
* Publication Date: January 25, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Solicitation Synopsis:**

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) for the acquisition of office furniture under Furniture Supply Arrangement E60PQ-140003/PQ. The purchase includes delivery and installation of category 3 furniture located in Longueuil, Quebec, Canada.

**Key Parameters:**

* UN/SPSC Code: 56101700 (Office furniture)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Longueuil, Quebec, Canada

**Procurement Method:**

This solicitation is an open bidding process. Bidders will be selected based on the lowest price.

**Instructions to Bidders:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on February 14, 2023.
* Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.
* A debriefing or feedback meeting will be available upon request to bidders, offerors, or suppliers who submitted an offer under the previous solicitation.

**Contact Information:**

* Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available

**Notice URL and Attachments:**

* None

Note:
Please make sure all formatting is preserved. No sensitive information has been redacted from this text. Let me know if you need any further assistance.
